Title: Exempts protective face masks or shields worn to help slow the spread of airborne diseases from sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Exempts protective face masks or shields worn to help slow the spread of airborne diseases from sales and compensating use taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting protective face masks or shields worn to help slow the spread of airborne diseases from sales and compensating use taxes
